answers.answer: Talk to a diabetic nurse and get informed, clinics are available to teach about diet and medications and options. Follow Dr.'s orders , get referred to specialists for opinions. Good Luck. MaritimeFox

question: My father has diabetes since last 22 years.He is suffering from diabetic neuropathy since last 3- 4 years, but now his albumin levels in urine are +++.Can i get a diet chart for him so that albumin levels can be controled?
title: Diet chart for patients having high albumin levels
